name: Go Sally! - Surfing
description:
“Go Sally! - Surfing"
Surf endless waves with professional surfer Sally Fitzgibbons!

Surf the wave, dodge the rocks, grab power-ups, catch BIG AIR and pull EPIC TRICKS. Get the highest score with the longest run and compete for the top spot on the high score table. Just don’t fall off!

- Play as world champion surfer Sally Fitzgibbons
- Pull off heaps of epic tricks like the 360 Kick Flip, Airwalk, 720 Backside Grab, Whale Slide and the Fitzy Spin
- 8 Different boards to collect, each with unique abilities!
- Collect awesome power-ups including Bubble Shield, Coin Doubler, Score Boost and Coin Magnet to help improve your high score.
- Save your ocean friends from fishing nets and get rewards as a friend of the environment! Remember it's your duty as a surfer to protect your playground.

Go Sally! is a fantastic game to test your reactions and get you in the right mindset for your next surf. Get creative : )

Follow the real Sally's adventures on the World Surf League as she competes for the World Title!!
